mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wz_carts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_checked_out = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wz_carts (cart_id, user_id, created_time) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wz_cart_items WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wz_cart_items ( cart_item_id, cart_id, product_id, quantity, price, product_name, created_time ) VALUES ( #{cartItemId}, #{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{productName}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE wz_cart_items SET quantity = #{quantity}, modified_time = NOW() WHERE cart_item_id = #{cartItemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wz_cart_items WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT ci.product_id, ci.quantity, ci.product_name, ci.price, p.image_url FROM wz_cart_items ci JOIN wz_carts c ON ci.cart_id = c.cart_id LEFT JOIN wz_products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.is_checked_out = 0 ORDER BY ci.created_time DESC
